jp.yuiki.dev.qiita4jv2.resources

Interface TagsResources

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Qiita
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    QiitaImpl

    public interface TagsResources
    See Also:
    https://qiita.com/api/v2/docs#タグ

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void followTag(java.lang.String tagId)
      Follows the tag.

    • Method Detail

      • getTags

        QiitaPageResponse<java.util.List<Tag>> getTags(int page,
                                               int perPage,
                                               java.lang.String sort)
                                        throws QiitaException
        Returns the all tags in descending order of creation date and time. Can be used even with unauthenticated.
        Parameters:
        page - the page number(perPage > 0 && perPage <= 100)
        perPage - the amount of tags included per page(perPage > 0 && perPage <= 100)
        sort - the tag order
        Returns:
        the all tags
        Throws:
        QiitaException - if arguments are incorrect or Qiita API is unavailable

      • getTag

        QiitaResponse<Tag> getTag(java.lang.String tagId)
                   throws QiitaException
        Returns the tag. Can be used even with unauthenticated.
        Parameters:
        tagId - the target tag identifier
        Returns:
        the got tag
        Throws:
        QiitaException - if arguments are incorrect or Qiita API is unavailable

      • getUserFollowingTags

        QiitaPageResponse<java.util.List<Tag>> getUserFollowingTags(java.lang.String userId,
                                                            int page,
                                                            int perPage)
                                                     throws QiitaException
        Returns the tags which the authenticated user follows in descending order of followed date and time. Can be used even with unauthenticated.
        Parameters:
        userId - the target user identifier
        page - the page number(perPage > 0 && perPage <= 100)
        perPage - the amount of tags included per page(perPage > 0 && perPage <= 100)
        Returns:
        the tags which the authenticated user follows
        Throws:
        QiitaException - if arguments are incorrect or Qiita API is unavailable

      • unfollowTag

        void unfollowTag(java.lang.String tagId)
          throws QiitaException
        Unfollows the tag. Needs access token.
        Parameters:
        tagId - the target tag identifier
        Throws:
        QiitaException - if arguments are incorrect or Qiita API is unavailable

      • isFollowingTag

        boolean isFollowingTag(java.lang.String tagId)
        Whether the authenticated user follows the tag. Needs access token.
        Parameters:
        tagId - the target tag identifier
        Returns:
        whether the authenticated user follows the tag

      • followTag

        void followTag(java.lang.String tagId)
        throws QiitaException
        Follows the tag. Needs access token.
        Parameters:
        tagId - the target tag identifier
        Throws:
        QiitaException - if arguments are incorrect or Qiita API is unavailable
